'''''oio''''' is a [[Quenya]] word, meaning "ever".<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, '''OY'''</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[oiale]]'' - "everlastingly"<ref>{{RGEO|Notes}}, ''Namárië''</ref>
* ''[[Oiolossë]]'' - "Ever-snow-white" (another name for ''[[Taniquetil]]'')<ref>{{S|Index}}, ''Oiolossë''</ref>
* ''[[Oiolairë]]'' - "Ever-summer''<ref>{{UT|Index}}, ''oiolairë''</ref>
* ''[[Oiomúrë]]''<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Helge Fauskanger]]|articleurl=http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/qlist.htm|articlename=Quenya Corpus Wordlist|dated=|website=Arda|accessed=16 February 2013}}</ref>
